Dosing and Body Weight

CrCl = ( 140 - age ) * IBW 72 * Scr * 0.85 (if female ) IBW M k g = 50 k g + 2.3 ( Height i n - 60 i n ) IBW F k g = 45.5 k g + 2.3 ( Height i n - 60 i n ) N B W = I B W + 0.25 * ( w t - I B W ) B S A ( m 2 ) = m a s s ( k g ) * h e i g h t ( c m ) 3600 B M R M = 66 + ( 13.7 * m a s s ( k g ) ) + ( 5 * h e i g h t ( c m ) ) ??? ( 6.8 * a g e ( y r s ) ) B M R F = 655 + ( 9.6 * m a s s ( k g ) ) + ( 1.7 * h e i g h t ( c m ) ) ??? ( 4.7 * a g e ( y r s ) )

Acid-Base

Anion Gap = [ Na + ] - [ Cl - ] - [ HCO 3 - ] Delta Gap = Anion Gap - Normal Anion Gap ]

Nitrogen Balance

Nitrogen Balance ( g ) = Nitrogen In ( g ) - Nitrogen Out ( g ) Nitrogen In ( g ) = 24hr Protein Intake ( g ) 6.25 Nitrogen Out ( g ) = 24hr UUN ( g ) + 4 ( g )

Fluids and Electrolytes

Serum Osm = 2 * [ Na ] + + BUN 2.8 + BG 18 Corrected Na = [Na] serum + 1.6 [ BG - 100 100 ] TBW M = 0.6 ( L / k g ) * w t ( k g ) TBW F = 0.5 ( L / k g ) * w t ( k g ) Na Deficit = TBW ( [ Na ] goal - [ Na ] serum ) FWD = TBW ( [Na] serum 140 - 1 ) Ca Corrected = Ca measured + 0.8 * ( 4 - Albumin ) Δ [Na] = Na fluid - Na serum T B W + 1
